posts.title: React 101
posts.subhead: Some basics to get you started with React
posts.body: React apps are build using components. These components are used to give you flexibility when writing code.

posts.title: Using JSX
posts.body: When writing your markup in react, you write it in JSX. This is very similar to HTML, but with some key differences. One difference to keep in mind is that JSX things expect a prop of className rather than class.
